lender.name: Kurt & Inok
lender.loan_because: We want to help those who are trying to better their lives. It is so encouraging to learn about these wonderful entreprenuers across the world.

lender.name: Art Z.
lender.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do.
Plus, I see where my money goes whereas in a traditional organization, huge amounts of money gets pooled together for more nameless purposes.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: This is such a brilliant concept! What an amazing way to make a contribution to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I help people on social assistance find work, training or educational upgrading.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: In order to have a profitable and successful economy , you must reinvest in it.

lender.name: Doug Wilson
lender.loan_because: I want to help enable people who are willing to take chances and work hard.
lender.occupational_info: I direct / manage Quality Assurance testing efforts to help ensure that computer software is built, or implemented, in a manner that results in high customer satisfaction.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is through the caring of individuals around the world that we can indeed change the world, one person, one family at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a pharmaceutical company to earn my money and to help the lives of many suffering from illnesses that need treatment. My passions include my family (patient and loving husband, our twins born in Cambodia and our daughter born in China) and the US branch of an NGO that I started as a non-profit organization that does similar work specifically in Cambodia, making the poorest communities self sustainable (www.tabithausa.org).

lender.name: Susan and Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: Microlending is an awesome opportunity to participate, person-to-person, with individuals in the improvement of the lives of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We have a small bookselling business, we love to travel and spend time with our grandchildren.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a structural engineer. I design buildings to withstand forces of nature - earthquakes, wind, etc.

lender.name: kerry
lender.loan_because: It is a direct way to help even the playing field
lender.occupational_info: We work with children to help them have access to books and learning experiences before they start school.

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a big difference in the life of someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I manage software engineers who implement a financial services web site for a company based in San Francisco.

lender.name: Jan K
lender.loan_because: I am now able to. I know what it's like to barely have enough money to survive, much less to indulge in small pleasures and help others. Now that my circumstances have improved, one of my pleasures is helping to provide someone else with an opportunity to improve their life.

lender.name: MARGARET
lender.loan_because: i want to help make a difference and to bring the best of life to those in need.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs, especially women, in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: With my husband I run an Educational Consultancy business specializing in Brain Based Learning and Anti-Bullying/Safe schools workshops, consultancy and resources.

lender.name: Trond
lender.loan_because: I can and I should
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large Norwegian media company where I produce ads for newspapers and the internet.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: it makes the world a better place and by golly I like it!
lender.occupational_info: metals distributor

lender.name: Bella
lender.loan_because: My uncle gave me a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas. I thought it would be nice to give money to someone that needs help with their business. I am now 11 years old but all most 12 I will be in the begining of April. I will tell my friends about Kiva so that they can help also.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the 6th grade in California, USA.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian!

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: positive outreach to achieve "Loaves & Fishes" miracles around the world improving financial foundation of future generations.
lender.occupational_info: Non-profit medical society improving the health of all Texans.

lender.name: louie
lender.loan_because: it's not charity, but empowering

lender.name: Mary Jane
lender.loan_because: I like to help others who are trying to make a better life for themselves. I admire effort and a desire to work at something.
lender.occupational_info: I help schools and companies with new projects in efficient ways to grow bigger and/or better in the services they deliver.

lender.name: Ya-Ya Sisters
lender.loan_because: We are a group of friends that get together every week. We have known each other for many years. Since we appreciate all that we have, for our birthdays we decided to give a Kiva loan to others that were working for a better life.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to help people help themselves. I feel it a privilege to loan.

lender.name: Ya-Ya Sisters
lender.loan_because: We are a group of friends that get together every week. We have known each other for many years. Since we appreciate all that we have, for our birthdays we decided to give a Kiva loan to others that were working for a better life.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: Helping others in need is what my Lord has commanded, which is to help my brothers in need; and is an expression of His and my love for all.
lender.occupational_info: I develop by researching and writing educational curriculum to help others become better leaders, people, and business men and women.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: it's what gives my life meaning.
lender.occupational_info: I want to narrow down the many disparities that exist in the world.

lender.name: Adam & Bethany
lender.occupational_info: Studying politics.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Great way to make money work for something good while individuals maintain their dignity
lender.occupational_info: I grow and sell fruits and vegetables to local customers

lender.name: Janet & Cathy & family
lender.loan_because: i am an entrepreneur too and the people who believed in me at the beginning of my business venture made a huge difference in my life and the life of our family. it is important to Cathy and i and the kids to help other entrepreneurs around the world get their start!
lender.occupational_info: janet teaches karate and violence prevention in her school and in local schools, community groups and businesses. Cathy is a trauma nurse. We have 5 daughters.

lender.name: walter
lender.loan_because: I always would like to help people specially the ones who start there own bussiness because i know how difficult it is to start one and to have someone who believes in you.
lender.occupational_info: At this time i work at one of the biggest airport in europe and i teach and coach people in security checks at the airport.

lender.name: Kristi & Christopher
lender.loan_because: When we travel we often meet motivated, honest people that just need a chance to succeed. Kiva offers us the opportunity to give back when we have been so fortunate personally. Also, Chris is an entrepreneur running a small software business with his father and brother. He relates very strongly to small business owners and knows how hard it can be to get started.
lender.occupational_info: Kristi is in marketing and is responsible for advertising, promotion, public relations, etc. Chris handles the technology and finances for his small business. The business is a niche software firm that deals with restaurant and hospitality companies, as well as alcoholic beverage manufacturers and suppliers.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I can. I am lucky enough to be employed, healthy, and happy.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 12 year old children.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: It's an honor to be a part of so many great projects doing great things around the world :)

lender.name: Winston
lender.loan_because: I believe that small contributions by individuals into a collective pool will result in tremendous benefits for the recipients. This will help our world become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I perform surgery.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I understand being poor and needing a helping hand. My father was a farm labor worker who worked 7 days a week to make ends meet. It is now my time to give an opportunity to my fellow man.
lender.occupational_info: I help business improve there profits

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: We all need to help
lender.occupational_info: I sell forklifts and storage products

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference - pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired from many years in the international hotel industry.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: It may help........

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: It's interesting, fun and helpful
lender.occupational_info: I help young people become more independent and improve the quality of thier lives - and I play music for people to dance to.

lender.name: Jacquie
lender.loan_because: It feels right and I like to support a larger community other than the one solely within my own borders.
lender.occupational_info:
I talk about things that matter to me and hopefully it strikes a chord with others.
I also like to paint and laugh.

lender.name: Marian and Theo
lender.loan_because: It's our way to support other members of our world that we know and for what business we support them. But also to stay in close contact with them and their efforts starting and/or expanding their business.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it is a privilege to be able to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants of all ages.

lender.name: Steve and Theresa
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed by the Lord and we want to pass it along.
lender.occupational_info: We take care of our growing family

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I get excited that I could actually make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I manage meetings and events for different companies. I plan and make sure they have everything they need for a successful time!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Not to know is bad. Not to want to know is worse. Not to hope is unthinkable. Not to care is unforgivable” -Nigerian saying
lender.occupational_info: I produce and publish map books or street atlases for seven counties of the Puget Sound Region in Washington

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: I feel I have been blessed with so much that I find this a wonderful way to give back. Thank you for giving me this opportunity.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: Winston reminded me that there is much that humility can do for humanity both near and far.
lender.occupational_info: I work toward making healthcare easier for people to access.

lender.name: B.J.
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur I want to help other entrepreneurs whose work benefits their community.
lender.occupational_info: I coach leaders, teams and individuals to improve their performance effectiveness by using strategies that work for the way in which they think.

lender.name: Richard M
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm now disabled due to lung disease and unable to work. Previously, I worked as a social worker in not for profit human services.

lender.name: Kathleen and Hank
lender.loan_because: it's so easy and inexpensive to make a big difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: The Harris Family
lender.loan_because: We have many blessings in our lives, and we want to give back and spread blessings to others.

lender.name: REK
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children that it does not take alot of money to make a difference in the world. Just alot of Love and Respect of our fellow human beings.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I'm paying it forward to other women.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: We all live together on this small planet earth. If we want to have a better life and better future for everyone we must help each other in any way we can.
lender.occupational_info: My job was helping people with problems such as sickness or disability to improve their lives.

lender.name: Brennan
lender.loan_because: people in other countries do not have the same opportunities as I have in the U.S.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: My grandmothers, Babe Schlatter and Emily Culberson, taught me by example to give to those in need.

lender.name: Marlies
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful thing to do! My brother gave me a gift certificate for Kiva and I just think it's great. It's a small way for me to make a big difference in the life of someone who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher specializing in French immersion and language acquisition.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an accountant for a government agency that handles business functions for all school districts in our county.

lender.name: Stephen & Stela
lender.loan_because: We know that if we all would share a little of our good fortune to those who have very little, the world would be a better place.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can and I like the idea of helping people to help them selves.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: if i can and you can, then they can!
lender.occupational_info: I am a geophysicist.

lender.name: Aaron A.
lender.loan_because: I owe much of my success to strangers who placed their faith in me.
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant for a network of hospitals in Alaska.

lender.name: 4Peace
lender.loan_because: It will make the world a better place. It encourages those who endevour to advance themselves, their families & communities even in the face of great hardship. It offers a gesture of respect for entreprenurial talent rather than a quickly passing act of charity. A fishing rod is a greater gift than a fish.
lender.occupational_info: I show industries how to better use computers to keep track of information.

lender.name: John S
lender.loan_because: This has to be one of the best possible ways to make a large and direct difference in the lives of people working their way out of poverty - and proof that we live in a flat world - not just because we can now sell our goods to anyone, anywhere but also because we can help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the creative director for a retail design and implementation group - we provide strategy for retail worldwide.

lender.name: Meridee
lender.loan_because: I believe in the strength of giving a hand up not just a hand out.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to find fulfillment, happiness and self satisfaction.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 14-18 year olds about English literature - everything from Shakespeare to modern film!

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful way to share the Blessings I have.

lender.name: sara
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: No matter where people are born, they deserve access to the same resources. Microlending brings this dream one step closer to reality.

lender.name: Stephen and Brenda
lender.loan_because: As with most really good things, it was suggested by a friend.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large multi-national professional services firm and my wife is a pharmacist.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I can help someone improve the quality of their life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketing coach and I am currently helping Realtors market themselves more effectively and build their client database.

lender.name: MGJ&Z
lender.loan_because: There are few life lessons more important to pass along to our kids than the importance of helping others. Kiva is a beautiful tool in SO many ways - thank you!

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: There is more happiness in giving than in receiving.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals and dreams.

lender.name: Una & Jerry
lender.loan_because: We enjoy being part of this grassroot effort to help people around the globe and being able to watch their progress. Thanks to Kiva and all who partake!

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: When I have been in need, people have always stepped up and helped out. I have been blessed to live a comfortable life and everyone deserves the same.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very quiet but I am lucky to work with a great group of people who are very supportive. We make sure our company's computer systems stay up and running.

lender.name: Randy Baca`
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending is the best kind of economic development! Improving the financial condition of a single family can help change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write poetry, books, articles---anything involving words--which I love.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I believe in humanity. I believe that we are all here to help one another. I believe that everyone can help whether they are rich or poor, big or small, black or white. I believe we all need help at some time in our lives.

lender.name: Devon
lender.loan_because: I love to help others and know that if it weren't for the people in my life I wouldn't be where I am today. I live to help those less fortunate than me in any way I can.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I think everyone has needed help at one time or another

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I believe anyone with a good idea and a strong work ethic deserves the chance to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I assist companies in raising capital by issuing equity or partnering with financial sponsors and by advising them in M&A transactions.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: I CARE.

lender.name: Tim & Nienke
lender.loan_because: this way of financing stimulates more than just 1 company or 1 person to achieve something in life. It also has great impact on the local economies if the entrepreneur is succesfull because of the financing.
lender.occupational_info: I am the owner of a hard chrome plating facility in the eastern part of the Netherlands. Next to hard chrome plating of various products, we also do cnc wheel grinding, cnc turning and milling and powder coating. I have 17 people working for me.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: "if you have the power to change the world, it is your responsibility to help change it ."

lender.name: Bonita
lender.loan_because: I get the warm feeling of making a donation, but will probably get the money back.
lender.occupational_info: I make visual things that help me understand the world.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I've seen the need. Kiva provides a way to use the same dollars over and over again to help meet people's needs.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: Helping others always makes the world a better place.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: Dad, before you died in 1994 you and I read about the internet. Back then we could not imagine what in the WORLD it might be truly useful for. Now we know: to 'help REPAIR the world' - one of the motives that guided your life and travels!
lender.occupational_info: My Kiva goal: To help fund loans to Central American women entrepreneurs....

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: the loans are for motivated people who spend their money wisely and effectively to help their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: I build internet applications and sites to help people promote and share their info on the web, not unlike the people who built Kiva.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help design / install / service HVAC systems>

lender.name: deborah
lender.loan_because: I believe we can't all help everyone but everyone can help someone!
lender.occupational_info: Fun, challenging, exciting!

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I desire to do something tangible to improve the world and believe we are at our best when helping others.

lender.name: Dashiell Gordon
lender.loan_because: It is a way for me to help the world out!
lender.occupational_info: Education.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I like to be of service to others.
lender.occupational_info: I play and teach music. I love each day!!!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: i have been given so much that i have much to give.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I love supporting people's success.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people to make life-changing transformations in their lives.

lender.name: Ty
lender.occupational_info: I study water in high mountainous areas.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I like money.
lender.occupational_info: Make computer goodies.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have many opportunities given to me in my lifetime. This is one small way I can share that with others who have not been as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a computer analyst at a rehabilitation hospital in Honolulu, Hawaii, USA. In my spare time I like to surf. I also volunteer for Access Surf Hawaii (www.accesssurf.org), an organization that helps people with disabilities get into the ocean to surf & swim.

lender.name: Deena
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel very good.
lender.occupational_info: I help discover the past.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: it's important to help others
lender.occupational_info: I give people a second chance at financial stability by helping them eliminate debt.

lender.name: Lam Vu
lender.loan_because: I would like the poor people to have a better life and their children to have a chance in life.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I sure wish someone would have made funds available to me when I really needed them.

lender.name: Koen&Angeline
lender.loan_because: this is a huge social bang for the buck. Let's do this together!

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping women in developing countries so they can support themselves and their children.

lender.name: Claire Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: Small things make a big difference. With the generosity and compassion of those who can assist, we can make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children in an urban downtown elementary school. Many of our students come from other countries either as refugees or as landed immigrants. These families have endured more than I could ever imagine and it's my passion to bring peace into their lives.

lender.name: Day-Stafford
lender.loan_because: We enjoy linking up with other people around the world to keep resources moving and to put money to good use.
lender.occupational_info: Rod is a Mennonite pastor, very interested in issues of faith and justice. Molly is a social worker, helping families deal with mental illness and recover from abuse and trauma. Julia and Laura are students.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: Because I believe that these loans really do make a difference, and it allows people to help themselves and has a long term impact, and the area of microfinancing has proven to not only be effective, but it also seems to be a great way to combat the current economic downturn with the people who need it most. Plus, they are small loans that we, as lenders, can take part in and afford.
lender.occupational_info: I attend university to get an education and I will hopefully be able to help even more people in the future. My degree is International Affairs with a concentration in East Asian business.

lender.name: kc
lender.loan_because: giving back is something that everyone should do to help others, not only in need but just to help just because.

lender.name: Libby & Brandon
lender.loan_because: Because we have been lucky enough to have wonderful lives and it makes us happy to help others
lender.occupational_info: We make coffee drinks for people.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am blessed with more than I need simply because of where I was born. It is my privilege to share some of that with others in the hope that it may do some good.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a company that manufactures electronic devices. My job is to sit at a desk and run a computer all day. It’s boring and dull. I don’t get any exercise so I get fat and my mind grows dull from staring at the computer screen. In many ways I am envious of the people I lend to. Have a great life.

lender.name: Eliot
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: shopkeep and I own an old building which I am fixing up

lender.name: H Hanna
lender.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."
Winston Churchill

lender.name: stacey and jon
lender.loan_because: we want to see the personal changes we can affect with our contributions

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I would like to contribute to the success of someone resourceful and committed enough to seek sources like Kiva to reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: President of two firms. One is Electronic Component Manufacturing, and one is Payment Processing.

lender.name: Martina
lender.loan_because: $25 for two weeks of coffee .... or actually making a difference? That was an easy decision for me.
lender.occupational_info: I have two of the most fulfilling jobs in the world - helping students learn, and raising the greatest little girl in the world.

lender.name: Matt and Doreen
lender.loan_because: the world needs some good news!
lender.occupational_info: Matt maintains UNIX computer server systems. Doreen teaches English at University. and Evelin is the coolest kid ever.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed---and that most of us need a leg-up to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a college study-abroad program in South India, helping facilitating students' learning and cultural immersion by advising, counseling, and sharing my own personal experiences in India.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: This is a brilliant, efficient, simple way to get capital to those in need. This is not charity -- it's a way to extend to others the financial services that we take for granted here in the West. Oh, and it's cool to help people. The Karma thing.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global risk mitigation firm, especially focusing in cyber security and cyber crime. I am also a reserve officer in the Air Force, having served in Afghanistan.

lender.name: Fred and Mary Beth
lender.occupation: Own Cedar House Inn & Yurts, Bed and Breakfast Inn
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to loan a small amount of money that can help in a big way. As a small business owner we understand how difficult it can be to raise funds to start and expand a business. In other countries it can be even more difficult since capital sources are not available.
lender.occupational_info: We own an eco friendly a bed and breakfast inn in the North Georgia mountains. We have rooms in the inn and yurts as well. We strive to be sustainable in our operations and try to create an awareness among our guests about living green.

lender.name: Lara Hanson
lender.loan_because: I can! :)

lender.name: Kerri
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, to help others get a leg up in life and give back in appreciation of the good life we have here.
lender.occupational_info: I want to help others to make the most of their own potential especially for the people I love in Honduras and Guatemala.

lender.name: Garry
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others and I recognize that life has provided me with more than a few good breaks and sharing my financial success with others is important.
lender.occupational_info: I start up new businesses in the electronics industry.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: its important to share our resources with others. Together we can make a difference in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and write programs that help people run their businesses.

lender.name: Randy and Barb
lender.loan_because: People who are willing to work deserve the opportunity to do so.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have the resources and others need them. I hope I can make a difference in the world....no matter how small.
lender.occupational_info: I spend a lot of time volunteering and traveling.

lender.name: Rico
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other out.
lender.occupational_info:
Hace más que treinta años que he enseñado y he ayudado otras personas y me gustaría continuar con este trabajo por muchos años más.
(I have taught and helped others for more than thirty years and would like to continue with this work for many more.)

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference & here I can make a choice & see who I am helping
lender.occupational_info: learning and teaching people about technology

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I had a chance to meet a bushman from Kenya in the fall of 07. I was rock climbing at Smith Rock State Park, he was on hike during a sponsored visit to the US. He was amazed he had never seen people do such a thing, he marveled at our ropes. As I stood next to him and shook his hand, I noticed he was a little bigger than half my size. I thought "this dude has to chase down his own bush meat". Later I thought, my life is mundane enough I have to actively invent exciting things to do! My belief is most charities usually have a secondary agenda plus poor cash management and worse execution. Engineers without Borders is a great group but seem to be preoccupied with not causing the slightest political issue. I was excited to learn about micro lending because the folks borrowing the money already have the vision, drive and a goal mapped out, they just need a little cash (by our standards) to get rolling to create their new future for themselves. They don’t need a catalyst, handout or motivational speech, just a little capital. If they default it is no big deal to me, I would prefer if they did not because they would just hurting the next person in need of loan more than me.
lender.occupational_info: My purpose is to use my knowledge and skills to help my customers achieve their goals.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Anyone with an idea and passion to build and contribute deserves a shot at executing such.
lender.occupational_info: First - I love my wife, family and dogs. I am thankful for what I have and the chances I have received in my life. I work for a large multi-national commercial bank. I love my job and the company I work for.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help disadvantaged people in the third world.
lender.occupational_info: I provide therapeutic support to hospital patients requiring assistance in breathing.

lender.name: Greg & Melinda
lender.loan_because: We have enough to share. Thru Kiva a little money can do so much for others trying to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a partner in a company that designs medical products. My wife is a retired finance director from a large manufacturing company.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It keeps me connected in a small way with places in the world I've visited.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I feel that even though I am only lower middle class, I have much more money and many more opportunities than women in other countries do. I feel that I need to share my abundance with other people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adult immigrants how to speak English so that can interact in their community, their children's schools and in order to get better jobs. I also teach native English students who need to complete their high school education so that they can get better jobs and feel better about themselves.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: women must help other women to be successful!
lender.occupational_info: we develop training programs

lender.name: S2RKC
lender.loan_because: We want to invest in people's lives so that they can have a better quality of life and provide for their families.

lender.name: Trinh
lender.loan_because: This account was started by the love of my life, which I am grateful for, because he knows how important it is to me to give and help make a positive impact in our world.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with the ability to live comfortably, and I hope to give that same gift to others.

lender.name: Paola
lender.loan_because: I care of people that have dreams and work hard to get them!
lender.occupational_info: It is creative and fun. I help people to enhance their business with creativity and idea placement.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I am an educator at a college, coordinating an office that helps students identify, plan, and achieve their educational, career and life goals.

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to make a big difference in peoples lives with small loans that I can give over and over again.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Environmental Science at an American High School in Southern France.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: Thank you Kiva for giving people an opportunity to participate in such a meaningful way.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: kal
lender.loan_because: ... Kiva allows me to SEE my actions make a difference in the world... wow!

lender.name: Jo Ellen
lender.loan_because: I've had times in my life where a little boost and a helping hand was all that was needed to stay encouraged and strive onward..and I love the idea that my little bit of $$ can make a difference to someone.
lender.occupational_info: I get up early..usually 2:30 a.m. to get airplanes ready for their flights, meet and greet people, load luggage and then come home to become a regular mom doing laundry, cooking, house cleaning..and volunteering with boy scouts and church....busy, busy..and then take time to do nothing but read and relax.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: when I loan I know that I am helping someone who doesn't have the money at the time to go and buy the things they need while others sit at home playing game systems and it is imprtant to donate to others who could use a helping hand.

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: Private business is essential. It is wonderful that I can help people help themselves.

lender.name: Lea
lender.occupation: An 8th grade student at Slater Middle School

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: because my nutcase of a brother in law gave me a gift certificate for Christmas.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an educator, naturalist, wife and mother.

lender.name: Annalis
lender.loan_because: My Godmother said it was a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: All consuming

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: They need it, I have it
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: We're all just folk.

lender.name: louise
lender.loan_because: Because I believe I have a responsibility and the privilege to support others. . Giving back feels like truly participating in the cycle of life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals and organizations to build stronger workplace relationships, reduce conflict and increase emotional intelligence.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place. I'm blessed to not worry about where my food and clothing are coming from and I want to help other's to have the same opportunity.

lender.name: Lea
lender.occupation: 8th grade student at Slater Middle School
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help others less fortuate than myself
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, do my homework, and that's pretty much it!

lender.name: Ann & Grant
lender.loan_because: We're delighted by the respectfulness of helping others as equals. We love the way these loans say "We believe in you and your abilities & together we can work toward a better future!" We're also excited to think that our money can keep on helping, over & over again...as each loan is repaid it can be re-invested...how fantastic! Plus each time we look at all the people we're in a lending group with...our world becomes a happier safer place.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be in a position to help others. I believe that the best way to achieve peace is not through force, but by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a producer for a computer game company.

lender.name: Yaffa
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro credit loans, the benefits of economic development and the power of self esteem, self reliance and self empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky enough at work to have benefits, health coverage and a pension plan. It is my wish that others are able to create a safety net for themselves and their families and provide food, shelter, safety and education for their children.

lender.name: Mary and Chris
lender.loan_because: We are so thankful for the many blessings in our life - a great and loving family, a roof over our heads and steady employment. It feels good to be able to help others who are trying to better themselves and their families.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.occupational_info: I am in school learning to be a teacher

lender.name: Blaine
lender.loan_because: It makes a big difference.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurship ventures worldwide and hope one day to be a successful entrepreneur myself.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Ken gave me a wonderful Christmas present in the fom of a KIVA gift certificate.
lender.occupational_info: Author: Every Natural Fact; Five Seasons of Open-Air Parenting.

lender.name: Brian & Suky
lender.loan_because: We want to make a small impact to specific people in less fortunate circumstances. We love the micro-loan concept that Kiva supports.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations define and achieve their identities, faster and more efficiently.

lender.name: Emanuele
lender.occupational_info: Seo Specialist - esperto di posizionamento siti internet nei motori di ricerca e web marketing

lender.name: Harari Family
lender.loan_because: Our family enjoys helping out as much as we can!

lender.name: Jim & Vicki
lender.occupation: Jim is Mechanic, Vicki is Manager, Human Services
lender.loan_because: For just a little money, you can make a difference in someone's life. And we love bikes!!!
lender.occupational_info: Jim fixes cars. Vicki takes care of two women who have Down's Syndrome.

lender.name: Marney
lender.loan_because: I need to do something to help and feel that enabling people to improve their lives is very important.

lender.name: Chelle Davidson
lender.loan_because: I think it's such a powerful way to truly be a global citizen and participant.
lender.occupational_info: I help run a small biodiesel production and distribution company. Our goal is to produce biodiesel using waste vegetable oil, not virgin feedstock

lender.name: Talina
lender.loan_because: I feel so lucky to be born in Australia and to have enough to share with someone less fortunate. I have worked hard to succeed and I would want every human to have the same opportunity, this can't happen unless I help where people earn less than $4 a day. I am blessed to have had education and enough to eat.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved and caring for and healing people. I love to spend time with my 2 children and 4 grandchildren, I enjoy gardening , reading ,writing and walking .

lender.name: isaiah
lender.occupational_info: I am 10 years old and I go to 4th grade at La Junta Intermediate School.

lender.name: PermacultureDesign
lender.loan_because: Of the need; and the absolute ease in which KIVA allows anyone to help brothers and sisters around the world realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Architectural & landscape design, construction and property maintenance

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: as a follower of Jesus, He stated, "'It is more blessed to give than to receive" (Acts 20:35). Jesus gave His life for me. Helping others financially, to improve their lives, is the least that I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a church that seeks to introduce people to Jesus Christ and to help them mature in Christlikeness.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: It gives people a chance at a better life. Everyone deserves opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: Transformational, spiritual, pastoral, justice oriented, organizational, truth telling, radical.

lender.name: denise aldelia
lender.loan_because: I've been helped in my life so many times. I would like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I dispense medication from a neighborhood pharmacy to people that include family and friends. Some customers have become friends through the 16 years I have worked for the company. My job is rewarding because I help people get through illnesses. I can sympathize when they are ill and rejoice when they get better.I hope my caring is part of what gets them better.I am a people person so I look forward to coming to work. I'm fortunate to live in the beautiful santa cruz county of california. close to ocean and mountains.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a fair chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help organize people to make flashy ads for the internet.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I believe it makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer and represent businesses.

lender.name: Zenia
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to start from zero.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate for Christmas from my daughter. She knows how much I like to help people

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do....

lender.name: Zackary Downey
lender.occupation: Artist and English instructor at large.
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info:
I teach English in South Korea to middle school students.
I also blog, create comics, draw, shoot & edit video, and annoy people.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's a pleasure to help people who are working so hard for a better life. I also just love the Kiva model and web site!

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because:
My Grandparents set up this account for me at Christmas. They think it is a great way to help others. They also thought I could learn more about other cultures, and different parts of the world.
A tiny pebble when cast on the water ... can make a big ripple effect.
lender.occupational_info:
I believe in the old saying ....
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lender.name: Haroon
lender.loan_because: I care !
lender.occupational_info: I act as a middle man between the Business and Information Technology department.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: RJR
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I love it.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to make a dent in the universe. We are ordinary people doing extraordinary things. Congrats to everyone who try to make a difference daily.
lender.occupational_info: Positive influencer #1. Problem solver #2. Have many university degrees but the above is what I do.

lender.name: Lam
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are in need.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: to give him money isn't charity He gives me some knowledge, I buy him some shoes
lender.occupational_info: To promote ecologically conscious and environmentally sustainable practices in all fields of business. To facilitate stress and trauma relief shops through the practice of breathing techniques and yoga.

lender.name: BlogWellDone
lender.loan_because: everyone enjoy the freedom to start their own business and to do what I can to improve the world's economy.
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories about people, places, and things.

lender.name: Kyle C.
lender.loan_because: it helps people.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to be specialized in the field of Meteorology. Weather has also been my life and I have the skills to enter the field.

lender.name: harry
lender.loan_because: i care.
lender.occupational_info: helping people have a better life

lender.name: Cami
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by women in Africa and their incredible strength and resiliency. I believe strong women are the key to overcoming adversity and for teaching the next generation to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer with a local group providing assistance to refugees that are resettled in Arizona, a state of the USA where I live.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to live in a country with economic stability. As a citizen of the world, I am grateful to Kiva for the opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Administrative assistant to an international communications firm

lender.name: Ken and Julie
lender.loan_because: I can - and we think its a great way to connect with the world
lender.occupational_info: Ken is a lawyer working for families and businesses having money problems; Julie is a Lawyer/Referee in Family Court for child custody cases

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: So many people in the world just need that small hand up in order to realize their greater potential.
lender.occupational_info: Former engineer. Now work to promote sustainable, affordable communities in Silicon Valley, USA.

lender.name: boutique|mac
lender.loan_because: As a business owner, I know from experience that lack of access to capital can limit the success of someone who has an otherwise solid business plan and the energy and motivation to execute it. I can only imagine the challenges that a business owner in a less developed country may face. I see Kiva as an amazing opportunity to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are a retail Macintosh computer store located in Nanaimo, BC, Canada

lender.name: Nadia
lender.loan_because: i believe that everyone should have the right to a future and to feed there family.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: It is so empowering knowing that collectively, no matter how how large or little one can give, a community of citizens devoted to alleviating poverty to small business owners all over the world can do so because of Kiva. It is just another way one can positively impact the world with little effort!
lender.occupational_info: I sell computers, portable music devices and phones to consumers and business professionals and teach them how to best utilize them at the Apple Store.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: my sister inspired me to participate and help others with such a simple gesture
lender.occupational_info: I look after children for a family where both parents are working outside of the home
